alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 10:56PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rooks, northwestern Osborne and southeastern Phillips Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1055 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Glade, or 12 miles south of Phillipsburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stockton around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Woodston and Alton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
